resources.string:
You've been dared to spend the entire night in a "haunted" house, but it turns out the place is actually haunted! Quickly make your escape from room to room and get out before the monsters get you!

• To move around, press and hold anywhere on the screen and you'll walk to that point.
• To exit the room, find the key and, after picking it up, head to the door.
• If your flashlight starts running low on power, find a safe spot to stop and shake the device to recharge.
• Watch out for monster; if they get you, it's all over!
Turn the sound on or off
Turn off shadows and make collision boxes visible
